basic.description:
Topics covered include central nervous system stimulants and depressants, narcotics, alcohol, cardiovascular agents, contraceptives, environmental toxicants, mechanism of drug action and disposition, antibiotics, drugs used in sports, over-the-counter drugs, food additives, and vitamins.
NOTE    Also offered as a distance course. Consult Continuing and Distance Studies.
RECOMMENDATION    4U Biology.
basic.subject: PHAR
basic.title: Introductory Pharmacology

extra.enrollment_requirement:
EXCLUSION    No more than 3.0 units from PHAR 100/3.0; PHAR 230/3.0. 
ONE-WAY EXCLUSION    May not be taken with or after: PHAR 340/3.0; PHAR 450/3.0
